description: This tender octopus salad is a taste of summer with lots of lemon, herbs and garlic.
name: Lemon & Garlic Octopus Salad Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 800g whole octopus, cleaned and sliced by your fishmonger

recipeInstructions.text: Place the octopus in a large pan of boiling water with the onion, carrot, celery, peppercorns, 2 cloves of garlic and vinegar. Reduce the heat and simmer for 40 minutes. Drain well.
Chop the octopus into pieces and place in a bowl. Add the olive oil, lemon juice, 1 clove of garlic, parsley and black pepper, toss and serve.
